outputs.output_descr:
The goal of this project is increase young people's meaningful participation in and contribution to Uganda's on-going democratization and development processes. The specific project objectives include;
1.To advocate for an enabling legal, social and governance framework that promotes young people's participation in god governance and development processes.
2.To build the capacity of youth Community Service Organisations to enable them effectively participate in Uganda's political and social transformation.
3.To sensitize the youth and other key policy stakeholders about youth concerns and involvement in Uganda's Millennium Development Goals (MDG) Initiatives.
